title: Enable Language Server
description: Use the gopls language server for enhanced functionality. The gopls command should be installed in your search path, or you can specify the full path below.

title: Language Server Command
description: The command name to start the gopls language server. Use an absolute path here if gopls is not in your search path.

children.description: Enables placeholders for function parameters or struct fields in completion responses.
Controls the information that appears in the hover text. SingleLine and Structured are intended for use only by authors of editor plugins.

The equivalent of the goimports -local flag, which puts imports beginning with this string after 3rd-party packages. It should be the prefix of the import path whose imports should be grouped separately.
Enable completion for packages that you do not currently imported
Enable the ability to return completions from deep inside relevant entities, rather than just the locally accessible ones.
Sets the algorithm that is used when calculating completion candidates.
Sets the algorithm that is used when finding workspace symbols.
Controls how symbols are qualified in symbol responses.
